attributes.action: Make it Illegal to drop mud on roads and not clear it up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want a law introduced or enforced so that people who drop mud on roads clear it up. For example when a farmer leaves a field and goes onto the road they drop mud on the roads and cause a hazzard. They must clean their vehicles before driving on public roads.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
